name: Pixel Pub
description:
Pixel Pub is a memory matching game that is intended for all ages. The more you play and the better you do, the harder it will get! Help customers get their favorite food by matching what they want with the correct food.

Train your memory, speed and concentration as you race the clock to serve as many customers as possible to earn coins.

Use the kitchen to unlock items and customize the menu for all your guests to enjoy.

Try cooking and risk either producing new foods or ruining what could have been a delicious dish.

Features:
• Memory Matching
• Multiple Unlockable Foods
• Cooking Risk Reward Mini-Game
• Customizable Menu
• Star Rating System
• Pixel Art

Install instructions

There are none! It's downloadable and playable on the play store. If anyone requests an android build be put on itch, I'll be a happy to do it. Just let me know!
